# meandr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of meandr is to easily generate random data that follows continuous path.

## Installation

You can install meandr like so:

``` {r install}
# devtools::install_github("sccmckenzie/meandr")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(dplyr)
library(meandr)

meandr(seed = 17) %>% 
  mplot()
```
